author: Anna Monette Roberts
title: The 1 Homemade Condiment You Should (and Can) Make Immediately
text:
How to Make Balsamic Reduction The 1 Homemade Condiment You Should (and Can) Make Immediately March 29, 2017 (Originally Posted: April 12, 2012) Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 The 1 Homemade Condiment You Should (and Can) Make Immediately 
If you already make your own salad dressings , then why not take it a step further by preparing your own condiments, too? One of the easiest and most decadent ways to dress up salads, appetizers, meats, and even desserts is balsamic glaze. It only requires one bottle of balsamic vinegar and 10 minutes. Here's the really easy method.
